titleStmt.title: Master Fynes his speech in Parliament: touching the proffer of the citie of London by the Lord Maior: on Thursday the 17. of February, 1641. to disburse 60000l. towards the suppressing the rebellion in Ireland.
titleStmt.author: Fiennes, Nathaniel, 1607 or 8-1669.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
